results.title: A resolution recognizing the 196th anniversary of the independence of Greece and celebrating democracy in Greece and the United States.
results.short_title: A resolution recognizing the 196th anniversary of the independence of Greece and celebrating democracy in Greece and the United States.
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Congratulates the people of Greece as they celebrate the 196th anniversary of the independence of Greece.  Supports the principles of democratic governance to which the people of Greece are committed.  Notes Greece's important role in the wider European region and in the community of nations since gaining its independence 196 years ago.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Congratulates the people of Greece as they celebrate the 196th anniversary of the independence of Greece.  Supports the principles of democratic governance to which the people of Greece are committed. actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1897)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
